meanings.definition: A person who is excessively self-centered and self-absorbed.
meanings.sent1: The egomaniac always talks about themselves and never listens to others.
meanings.sent2: Sheila's brother is such an egomaniac, always boasting about his achievements.
meanings.sent3: The egomaniac thought the whole world revolved around them.
meanings.sent4: His ego was so big, he could fit the entire universe inside it, like an egomaniac black hole.
meanings.sent5: The mirror shattered when the egomaniac looked into it, unable to handle the self-centeredness.

meanings.definition: Someone who is obsessed with their own importance and abilities.
meanings.sent1: The egomaniac believed they were the best at everything they did.
meanings.sent2: Being an egomaniac, he couldn't stand anyone else getting attention.
meanings.sent3: The egomaniac's head grew so big, they needed a bigger hat.
meanings.sent4: Her ego was like a balloon, inflating more and more each day, just like an egomaniac.
meanings.sent5: The room felt smaller whenever the egomaniac entered, their self-importance filling every corner.
